products.name: Flowery
products.description:
350 GSM: Thick, premium fabric that provides warmth and comfort.

60% Cotton, 40% Polyester Blend: Combines softness with durability, ensuring a comfortable and long-lasting wear.

Pre-Shrunk: Designed to maintain its fit and shape, even after multiple washes.

Double Hood: Offers extra warmth and a stylish look.

Cross Neck Design: Adds a unique, fashionable touch to the classic hoodie style.
Super Combed Cotton: Enhanced softness and a smooth texture for a luxurious feel.

No Colour Fading: Keeps its vibrant color over time, resisting fading and wear.
